summary: Alex created and locked in the sprint plan for user stories US-4, US-5, and US-6, covering authentication, session management, and employee CRUD operations to progressively build the HR module. He requested Mike to add these to the backlog and assign them.

decisions.title: Sprint plan created and locked in
decisions.details: Ordered implementation: 1) US-4: User authentication endpoints with JWT; 2) US-5: Session management including token refresh, logout, and middleware; 3) US-6: Employee CRUD operations integrated with auth guards.

actions.task: Add the sprint plan user stories US-4, US-5, and US-6 to the backlog and assign them

backlog_deltas.title: Add sprint plan with US-4, US-5, and US-6 to backlog
